description: Demolition of all existing buildings and structures and erection of three buildings ranging from 4-10 storeys in height comprising 478 residential units of 1, 2 and 3 bed size with provision for non-residential uses at ground level comprising Class A1, A2, A3, B1, and D2 in various combinations; a Community Health Facility and premises for ophthalmologist/ pharmacist/ chiropodist use.  Provision is made for a total 310 parking spaces (of which 304 will be in the basements), along with areas of external amenity, circulation and landscaping space.  (This application represents a redesign of blocks EG1, EG2 and EG3 approved under planning application ref. P01/1501 on 30 May 2002 and reserved matters approval application ref. P02/2370 on 20 December 2002).
site_name: Land At Eden Grove And Greary Street Estate 11 To 75 Eden Grove And 1 To 13 Greary Street
